page.title: 11The Environs of Palehouse
page.content: Residents of Palehouse Common are predominantly elderly with only a few families with young children. The main building of the High Cross Estate, which was an old peoples' home for a short time, burnt down a few years ago under strange circumstances. The only disturbance comes from the main road which is used by fast or heavy traffic. The residents hope that the bypass in nearby Little Horsted will ease the problem when it opens soon. Most of the residents keep dogs for a feeling of extra security in such an isolated area.
